Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       He nods at Kup.  "Sir, there is something you need to know about the 
disease the girl escaped from.  It is known only as The Plague.  It's effects 
are both swift and deadly.  Fortunately it's deadliness eventually killed it 
off enough for those of my time to develop a vaccine.  Unfortunately she is 
from a few decades before my time.  She doesn't appear to be infected 
however."  He pauses for a moment.  "There were rumored accounts, nothing was 
ever confirmed mind you, but I have heard stories of carriers.  Some have 
been infected but survive without symptoms for some unknown reason.  There is 
a way to test."  He thinks to himself for a moment.  "First, if Windlord 
hasn't been bitten, get him out of there.  There's something in the bite that 
transmits the disease.  Then I need to borrow an expendable maintenance 
drone."

--part1_1d5.44329b5.2b96d314_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
